attributes.background: We’re not in the EU now , we should be able to set our own laws out now , so I think it’s about time that capital punishment should be brought back

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Bring back the Death Penalty for child sexual abuse, rape and murder: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/618680

Hold a referendum on whether capital punishment should be restored: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/618347
